channel.title: I needz helpo!
channel.description:
I need some help with my server. How do I make it so that my server starts on my I.P on my computer, because every-time I start it, it says :
Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
how do I make it where it starts it on my I.P instead? Who ever helps me I will give them credit in my server!!! and It also says every-time i start it, it says : "Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 how do i fix that?

item.title: I needz helpo!
item.dc:creator: @jacosmoot jacosmoot
item.description:
@jacosmoot wrote:

Iâ€™ll let you know if it works cause i gotta test it. And btw, how would you like to be my co-owner on my server??

Read full topic

item.title: I needz helpo!
item.dc:creator: @Ground_zero_317 Ground zero 317
item.description:
@Ground_zero_317 wrote:

go to client folder then go to the client . java folder press ctrl + f and search for server ip and then it should say 127.0.0.1 or local host or 0.0.0.0 then erase that and put your no-ip adress there. Only do this when your going put your server online for other people for after portforwarding

Read full topic
